tasks.title: Conduct User Testing for Mobile App
tasks.description: Initiate and oversee the user testing phase for the mobile application. Create a testing plan that covers various scenarios and user interactions. ..Recruit participants representative of the target user base. Facilitate usability testing sessions, collect feedback, and analyze results. Collaborate with the development team to address identified issues and implement improvements. Ensure that the user experience aligns with the product's design principles and usability standards. Prepare a detailed report summarizing the findings and proposed enhancements.

tasks.title: Organize Team-building Workshop
tasks.description: Plan and execute a team-building workshop for the entire project team. Identify suitable activities that encourage collaboration, communication, and team cohesion. Coordinate with external facilitators if needed. Arrange logistics, including venue, materials, and catering. Communicate the agenda and goals of the workshop to team members in advance. Capture feedback during and after the event to evaluate its effectiveness. Foster a positive and inclusive environment that strengthens the team's bonds and contributes to a positive work culture.
